roleset.name: remove associations of shame or disgrace

example.name: destigmatize
example.text: and when individuals like you take the time 0 *PRO* to do what you're doing *T*-2 and um *PRO*-4 being so authentic and open *T*-3 it just desti- destigmatizes it.
